sentences.sContent: We like everybody to say what they think.
sentences.sContent_eng: We like everybody to say what they think.
sentences.sCn: 我们喜欢让人人都说出他们的看法。

sentences.sContent: However it is impossible for us to make friends with everybody.
sentences.sContent_eng: However it is impossible for us to make friends with everybody.
sentences.sCn: 然而对我们来说是不可能和每个人交朋友。

sentences.sContent: And yet everybody has certain ideals which determine the direction of his endeavors and his judgments.
sentences.sContent_eng: And yet everybody has certain ideals which determine the direction of his endeavors and his judgments.
sentences.sCn: 可是每个人都有一些理想，这些理想决定着他的努力和判断的方向。
